category: Regulations on establishment and operation of advisory committee/Article 18 (Womenâ€™s Sports Committee)
contents: Article 18 (Women's Sports Committee) The Women's Sports Committee responds to the president's advice on the following matters. Revised 2018. 7. 9., 2019. 1. 31., 2023. 7. 5. 1. Matters pertaining to the development, guidance and dissemination of women's sports 2. Matters pertaining to women's sports events 3. Matters pertaining to women's sports facilities 4 Matters related to women's sports development 5. Matters related to international exchanges related to women's sports 6. Other matters considered to be in accordance with the functions of the Women's Sports Committee and submitted by the chairman [Moved from Article 17, previous Article 18 to Article 15. Move 2017. 4. 3.]
